abstract: Ben S. Bernanke, the Fed chairman, said Asian nations are now the engine of a global economic recovery.
snippet: Ben S. Bernanke, the Fed chairman, said Asian nations are now the engine of a global economic recovery.
lead_paragraph: SANTA BARBARA, Calif.  Ben S. Bernanke, the chairman of the Federal Reserve, said on Monday that Asian nations were pulling the global economy out of its downturn but warned that both Asia and the United States needed to do more to reduce global trade imbalances.

headline.main: Asia Said to Be Leading the Globe Out of Crisis
headline.print_headline: Asia Said to Be Leading The Globe Out of Crisis

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
